mapper.select: SELECT product.p_idx AS p_idx, seller_idx, p_category_idx, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_discount,p_disprice, product_img.p_sys_filename,p_status, p_wday,p_modifyday, IFNULL(avg(review_stars),0) AS avg_reviews_stars, COUNT(review_stars) AS cnt_reviews FROM product LEFT JOIN product_img ON product.p_idx = product_img.p_idx LEFT JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx GROUP BY product.p_idx ORDER BY p_idx DESC;

SELECT product.p_idx AS p_idx, seller_idx, p_category_idx, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_discount,p_disprice, product_img.p_sys_filename,p_status, p_wday,p_modifyday, IFNULL(avg(review_stars),0) AS avg_reviews_stars, COUNT(review_stars) AS cnt_reviews FROM product LEFT JOIN product_img ON product.p_idx = product_img.p_idx LEFT JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx LEFT JOIN detail ON product.p_idx = detail.p_idx GROUP BY product.p_idx ORDER BY p_discount DESC;

SELECT product.p_idx AS p_idx, seller_idx, p_category_idx, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_discount,p_disprice, product_img.p_sys_filename,p_status, p_wday,p_modifyday, IFNULL(avg(review_stars),0) AS avg_reviews_stars, COUNT(review_stars) AS cnt_reviews FROM product LEFT JOIN product_img ON product.p_idx = product_img.p_idx LEFT JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx LEFT JOIN detail ON product.p_idx = detail.p_idx GROUP BY product.p_idx ORDER BY avg_reviews_stars DESC;

SELECT product.p_idx AS p_idx, seller_idx, p_category_idx, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_discount,p_disprice, product_img.p_sys_filename,p_status, p_wday,p_modifyday, IFNULL(avg(review_stars),0) AS avg_reviews_stars, COUNT(review_stars) AS cnt_reviews FROM product LEFT JOIN product_img ON product.p_idx = product_img.p_idx LEFT JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx LEFT JOIN detail ON product.p_idx = detail.p_idx GROUP BY product.p_idx ORDER BY cnt_reviews DESC;

SELECT product.p_idx AS p_idx, seller_idx, p_category_idx, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_discount,p_disprice, product_img.p_sys_filename,p_status, p_wday,p_modifyday, IFNULL(avg(review_stars),0) AS avg_reviews_stars, COUNT(review_stars) AS cnt_reviews, count(detail.detail_idx) as ccnntt FROM product LEFT JOIN product_img ON product.p_idx = product_img.p_idx LEFT JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx LEFT JOIN detail ON product.p_idx = detail.p_idx GROUP BY product.p_idx ORDER BY ccnntt DESC;

SELECT product.p_idx AS p_idx, p_name, review_stars, review_content, m_nick, m_profile, review_wday FROM product INNER JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx INNER JOIN members ON review.midx = members.midx GROUP BY p_idx ORDER BY review_idx DESC;

SELECT product.p_idx AS p_idx, seller_idx, p_category_idx, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_discount,p_disprice, product_img.p_sys_filename,p_status, p_wday,p_modifyday, IFNULL(avg(review_stars),0) AS avg_reviews_stars, COUNT(review_stars) AS cnt_reviews FROM product LEFT JOIN product_img ON product.p_idx = product_img.p_idx LEFT JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx where p_delyn = 'N' AND p_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR p_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY product.p_idx ORDER BY p_idx DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p_idx) FROM product WHERE p_delyn = 'N' AND p_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR p_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT product.p_idx as p_idx, p_sys_filename, p_name, review_stars, review_content, m_nick FROM product INNER JOIN product_img ON product.p_idx = product_img.p_idx INNER JOIN review ON product.p_idx = review.p_idx INNER JOIN members ON review.midx = members.midx GROUP BY p_idx ORDER BY review_idx DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE sellerstory SET seller_followcnt = seller_followcnt +1 WHERE seller_idx = #{seller_idx}
UPDATE follow SET delyn = 'Y' WHERE delyn = 'N' AND seller_idx = #{seller_idx} AND midx = #{midx}
UPDATE sellerstory SET seller_followcnt = seller_followcnt-1 WHERE seller_idx = #{seller_idx}
